alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 9:25PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and central Pennington Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 925 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Box Elder, or 8 miles east of Rapid City, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ellsworth Air Force Base around 935 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 60 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
